EventCategory.name: Transient
EventCategory.Comment: Loose cuts appropriate for transient source analysis

EventCategory.name: DoNotUse
EventCategory.Comment: Do not Use this class

EventCategory.name: Source
EventCategory.ShortCut: CTBParticleType==0 && CTBClassLevel >= 1 && CalTrackDoca < sqrt(100. + (15000000/max(CTBBestEnergy,10.))) && CTBAllProb > max(0.7,0.996-1.4e-4*pow(max(5.4-CTBBestLogEnergy,0),5.3)) && CTBBestEnergyProb > 0.1 && (CTBWasLkHd==0 || CTBBestEnergyProb > 0.3) && CTBCALGamProb > 0. && CTBTKRGamProb > 0. && CTBCORE > max(0.025,0.025+0.175*(3.-CTBBestLogEnergy)) && CalTrackAngle * min(1., sqrt(CTBBestEnergy/20000)) < 0.35 && CalTrSizeTkrT100 > 17.2-8.6342e-7*pow(max(10.83-CTBBestLogEnergy,0),7.229) && (TkrNumTracks > 1||(Tkr1Chisq > 0.4 && (CTBBestEnergy < 100 || CalTransRms > 15-12.5*max(2.4-CTBBestLogEnergy,0.))))
EventCategory.Comment: Cuts appropriate for point source analysis

EventCategory.name: Clean
EventCategory.ShortCut: CTBParticleType==0 && CTBClassLevel >= 1 && CalTrackDoca < sqrt(100. + (15000000/max(CTBBestEnergy,10.))) && CTBAllProb > max(0.7,0.996-1.4e-4*pow(max(5.4-CTBBestLogEnergy,0),5.3)) && CTBBestEnergyProb > 0.1 && (CTBWasLkHd==0 || CTBBestEnergyProb > 0.3) && CTBCALGamProb > 0. && CTBTKRGamProb > 0. && CTBCORE > max(0.025,0.025+0.175*(3.-CTBBestLogEnergy)) && CalTrackAngle * min(1., sqrt(CTBBestEnergy/20000)) < 0.35 && CalTrSizeTkrT100 > 17.2-8.6342e-7*pow(max(10.83-CTBBestLogEnergy,0),7.229) && (TkrNumTracks > 1||(Tkr1Chisq > 0.4 && (CTBBestEnergy < 100 || CalTransRms > 15-12.5*max(2.4-CTBBestLogEnergy,0.)))) && CalTrSizeTkrT100 < 32+0.349*pow(max(6.0-CTBBestLogEnergy,0),4.27) && Tkr1ToTTrAve > (0.9+0.143*pow(max(CTBBestLogEnergy-1.0,0.),1.46)) && Tkr1ToTTrAve < (2.4+0.277*pow(max(CTBBestLogEnergy-1.0,0),2.28)) && (abs(AcdTkr1ActiveDist-40) > 5 || Tkr1SSDVeto > 0) && ((AcdTkr1ActiveDist > 0)*AcdTkr1ActDistTileEnergy) < max(0.2,0.2+0.5*(CTBBestLogEnergy-4.0)) && ((CTBBestLogEnergy < 3||CalCfpTmax < min(11.2,4.5+2.75*max(CTBBestLogEnergy-3.,0.))) && (CTBBestLogEnergy < 3.5 || CalCfpTmax > 2+2.25*max(CTBBestLogEnergy-3.,0))) && (Tkr1FirstLayer > 5||CTBBestEnergy > 1000||(1.+0.085*(Tkr1FirstLayer-2))*CalEnergyCorr/CTBBestEnergy > max(0.5,0.85-0.35*max(2.7-CTBBestLogEnergy,0)))
EventCategory.Comment: Cuts appropriate for diffuse source analysis

EventCategory.name: UltraClean
EventCategory.ShortCut: CTBParticleType==0 && CTBClassLevel >= 1 && CalTrackDoca < sqrt(100. + (15000000/max(CTBBestEnergy,10.))) && CTBAllProb > max(0.7,0.996-1.4e-4*pow(max(5.4-CTBBestLogEnergy,0),5.3)) && CTBBestEnergyProb > 0.1 && (CTBWasLkHd==0 || CTBBestEnergyProb > 0.3) && CTBCALGamProb > 0. && CTBTKRGamProb > 0. && CTBCORE > max(0.025,0.025+0.175*(3.-CTBBestLogEnergy)) && CalTrackAngle * min(1., sqrt(CTBBestEnergy/20000)) < 0.35 && CalTrSizeTkrT100 > 17.2-8.6342e-7*pow(max(10.83-CTBBestLogEnergy,0),7.229) && (TkrNumTracks > 1||(Tkr1Chisq > 0.4 && (CTBBestEnergy < 100 || CalTransRms > 15-12.5*max(2.4-CTBBestLogEnergy,0.)))) && CalTrSizeTkrT100 < 32+0.349*pow(max(6.0-CTBBestLogEnergy,0),4.27) && Tkr1ToTTrAve > (0.9+0.143*pow(max(CTBBestLogEnergy-1.0,0.),1.46)) && Tkr1ToTTrAve < (2.4+0.277*pow(max(CTBBestLogEnergy-1.0,0),2.28)) && (abs(AcdTkr1ActiveDist-40) > 5 || Tkr1SSDVeto > 0) && ((AcdTkr1ActiveDist > 0)*AcdTkr1ActDistTileEnergy) < max(0.2,0.2+0.5*(CTBBestLogEnergy-4.0)) && ((CTBBestLogEnergy < 3||CalCfpTmax < min(11.2,4.5+2.75*max(CTBBestLogEnergy-3.,0.))) && (CTBBestLogEnergy < 3.5 || CalCfpTmax > 2+2.25*max(CTBBestLogEnergy-3.,0))) && (Tkr1FirstLayer > 5||CTBBestEnergy > 1000||(1.+0.085*(Tkr1FirstLayer-2))*CalEnergyCorr/CTBBestEnergy > max(0.5,0.85-0.35*max(2.7-CTBBestLogEnergy,0))) && ((Tkr1FirstLayer > 5 && (CTBAllProb > 0.996-0.0394*pow(max(3.26-CTBBestLogEnergy,0),1.78)))||(Tkr1FirstLayer <= 5 && (CTBAllProb > 0.996-0.006*pow(max(4.0-CTBBestLogEnergy,0),3.0))))
EventCategory.Comment: Cuts appropriate for isotropic analysis

EventCategory.name: S2
EventCategory.Comment: Extremely loose cuts appropriate for GRB analysis.

EventCategory.name: NoCal
EventCategory.Comment: Events with no calorimeter data.

EventCategory.name: S3
EventCategory.Comment: Very loose cuts appropriate for GRB analysis

EventCategory.name: CalOnly
EventCategory.Comment: Events where only calorimeter information was used in analysis.

EventCategory.name: S3NoCal
EventCategory.Comment: Events in either S3 or NoCal.

EventCategory.name: S2NoCal
EventCategory.Comment: Events in either S3, S2 or NoCal.

EventCategory.name: LLE
EventCategory.Comment: Usable Events for Transient Analysis

EventCategory.name: LLESSDVeto
EventCategory.Comment: LLE Selection and least one missing at front of track

EventCategory.name: LEE
EventCategory.Comment: Cuts for Low Energy Electron Analysis

EventCategory.name: HEE
EventCategory.Comment: Cuts for High Electron Analysis

EventCategory.name: ProtonHiAccept
EventCategory.Comment: High acceptence proton sample

EventCategory.name: ProtonHiPure
EventCategory.Comment: High purity proton sample

EventCategory.name: ProtonHiQual
EventCategory.Comment: High purity and high quality reconstruction proton sample

EventCategory.name: Alpha
EventCategory.Comment: Alpha Particles

EventCategory.name: Heavy
EventCategory.Comment: Heavy Ions
